Clever Geek Handbook

SMSã«ã‚ˆã‚‹æ°—è±¡ã‚®ã‚¹ãƒ¡ãƒ†ã‚ªï¼ˆbashï¼‰

HabrÃ©ã§ä¸€åº¦ã€ã‚®ã‚¹ãƒ¡ãƒ†ã‚ªã§å¿…è¦ãªéƒ½å¸‚ã®æ§‹æ–‡è§£æã‚’è¡Œã†ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆã‚’ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã—ã€email2smsã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦é›»è©±ã«é€ä¿¡ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ ãã‚Œã«ã¯2ã¤ã®æ¬ ç‚¹ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸï¼šFreeBSDã§æ›¸ã‹ã‚ŒãŸï¼ˆLinuxã§ç§»æ¤ã™ã‚‹ã®ã¯éå¸¸ã«ç°¡å˜ã§ã—ãŸãŒï¼‰ã€ãã—ã¦æœ€ã‚‚é‡è¦ãªã“ã¨ã«ã¯ã€é™æ°´é‡ã‚’ç¤ºã•ãªã‹ã£ãŸï¼ˆo_Oï¼‰ã€‚ ãã®ãŸã‚ã€æƒ…å ±æä¾›è€…å‘ã‘ã®xmlã‹ã‚‰æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—ã—ã€ä¾¿åˆ©ãªå½¢å¼ã«å¤‰æ›ã—ã¦SMSã§é€ä¿¡ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã€ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ ãã‚Œã‹ã‚‰å½¼ã¯è€ƒãˆã‚’å¤‰ãˆã¦ã€ã‚¼ãƒ­ã‹ã‚‰æ›¸ãã¾ã—ãŸã€‚



ã“ã‚Œã¯ä¸€èˆ¬ã«3ç•ªç›®ã¾ãŸã¯5ç•ªç›®ã®bashã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆã§ã‚ã‚Šã€awkã‚’åˆã‚ã¦ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã€xmlã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸã“ã¨ã¯ä¸€åº¦ã‚‚ãªã„ã¨è¨€ã‚ãªã‘ã‚Œã°ãªã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ ã—ãŸãŒã£ã¦ã€ç§ã¯ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã™ã¹ã¦ã‚’å¿…è¦ãªãƒ¬ãƒ™ãƒ«ã¾ã§å­¦ç¿’ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ã“ã‚Œã¯æ•°æ™‚é–“ã®ã‚°ãƒ¼ã‚°ãƒ«ã§è¡Œã‚ã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ ç§ã¯ã“ã‚Œã‚’ã™ã¹ã¦è¨€ã£ã¦ã€æ˜ç™½ãªï¼ˆç§ã®ãŸã‚ã§ã¯ãªã„ï¼‰å¤±æ•—ã®ãŸã‚ã«ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ã‹ã‚‰ã‹ã‚ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ã¾ã™ãŒã€ãã‚Œã‚’ä¿®æ­£/æœ€é©åŒ–ã™ã‚‹æ–¹æ³•ã¨æ–¹æ³•ã‚’ææ¡ˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ ã“ã®ãŸã‚ã€ç§ã¯éå¸¸ã«æ„Ÿè¬ã—ã¾ã™ï¼ˆï¼š

å®Ÿéš›ã€ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆã‚’æ©Ÿèƒ½ã•ã›ã‚‹ã«ã¯ã€ xmlstarletãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ãŒå¿…ãšå¿…è¦ã§ã™ã€‚ ãƒ¬ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã®é€ä¿¡ã¯muttã‚’çµŒç”±ã—ã¾ã™ãŒã€ãŸã¨ãˆã°mailã«ç°¡å˜ã«ç½®ãæ›ãˆã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰è‡ªä½“ã¯æ¬¡ã®ã¨ãŠã‚Šã§ã™ã€‚

  1. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  2. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  3. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

  5. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  6. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  7. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  8. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  9. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  10. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  16. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  17. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  18. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  19. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

  24. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  25. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  26. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  27. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

  33. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  34. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  35. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  36. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    exit 0 0



  42. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  43. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  44. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

  50. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  51. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  52. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  53. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    exit 0 0



  59. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  60. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    if [ [ "$prec" == "10" ] ] ; then pr = "bez osadkov" elif [ [ "$prec" == "9" ] ] ; then pr = "n\d" elif [ [ "$prec" == "8" ] ] ; then pr = "groza" elif [ [ "$prec" == "6" || "$prec" == "7" ] ] ; then pr = "sneg" elif [ [ "$prec" == "5" ] ] ; then pr = "liven" elif [ [ "$prec" == "4" ] ] ; then pr = "dozhd" fi }

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    # sms . ($tc) ($tmin)-($tmax) wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "02 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w02 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0



  61. #!/bin/bash

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi

    # f_temp ( ) { tc =$ ( ( $tmax / 2 + $tmin / 2 ) ) echo "$tc" }

    # xml ( cat <<'EOF' <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:for-each select="MMWEATHER/REPORT/TOWN/FORECAST"> <xsl:value-of select="@hour" /> h <xsl:for-each select="PHENOMENA"> <xsl:value-of select="@cloudiness" /> c <xsl:value-of select="@precipitation" /> p </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="TEMPERATURE"> <xsl:value-of select="@min" /> tn <xsl:value-of select="@max" /> tx </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> EOF ) > / tmp / informer.xsl

    # xml-. wget -q -O / tmp / informer.xml http: // informer.gismeteo.ru / xml / 33526 _1.xml

    # , xmlstarlet- / usr / bin / xmlstarlet tr / tmp / informer.xsl / tmp / informer.xml > / tmp / informer.tmp

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "08 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w08 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "14 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w14 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    wh = ` cat / tmp / informer.tmp | grep -A 4 "20 h" ` wheather f_clpr f_temp w20 = ` echo "$cl" "$pr" t:"$tc" `

    # . sms-gate echo "noch':$w02; utro:$w08; den':$w14; vecher:$w20" | mutt -s "" xxxxxxxxxx@sms.kyivstar.net

    # rm -f / tmp / informer.xml / tmp / informer.tmp / tmp / informer.xsl

    exit 0 0

    # xmlstarlet- mxl- wheather ( ) { cloud = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $3}' ` prec = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $5}' ` tmin = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $7}' ` tmax = ` echo $wh | awk '{print $9}' ` }

    # f_clpr ( ) { if [ [ "$cloud" == "0" ] ] ; then cl = "jasno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "1" ] ] ; then cl = "per.obl." elif [ [ "$cloud" == "2" ] ] ; then cl = "oblachno" elif [ [ "$cloud" == "3" ] ] ; then cl = "pasmurno" fi
